exercises.name: Pec Stretch in Doorway
directions: place hand on doorway with elbow at 90 degree angle

exercises.name: D2 Flexion- Drawing the sword
directions: Start by holding an elastic band down by your side to fixate it with your uninvolved arm
Next, using the involved arm,draw the other end of the band upwards and towards the opposite side

exercises.name: Foam Roller Snow Angels
directions: Lie down on a foam roller and allow your arms to drop towards the floor with your elbows straight
Slide your arms towards over your head and then return your arms to your side and repeat

exercises.name: Lacrosse ball self-massage to Posterior Capsule
directions: Place ball against wall and press chest into it just below clavicle
Move side to side and up and down
Repeat for upper shoulder on back

exercises.name: Prone T - Thumb up
directions: Lie face down with your elbow straight and arm dangling down towards the floor
Next, set your scapula by retracting ittowards your spine and downward towards your feet.
Then, slowly raise your arm keeping your elbow straight the entiretime as shown.
Your thumb should be pointed in the upward direction as your arm raises.

exercises.name: Sidelying - External rotation
directions: Lie on your side and hold a weight with your elbow bent and rested on your side.
Next, draw up the your arm from theground towards the ceiling.

exercises.name: Elastic Band Rows
directions: Holding elastic band with both hands, draw back the band as you bend your elbows.
Keep your elbows near the side ofyour body.
